se.natusoft.tools.fileeditor.internal

Class TextPos

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.natusoft.tools.fileeditor.internal.TextPos

  • public class TextPos
extends Object
    This represents a positional that ranges from 1 to Integer.MAX_VALUE.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean BASE_ZERO
      Can be used for the 2 arg constructor to make it more readable.
      static TextPos FIRST
      The first TextPos value.
      static TextPos LAST
      Represents the unknown last position.
      static int NO_MAX_LIMIT
      Value to pass to adjustLimits() if not max value is available.
      static TextPos SECOND
      The second TextPos value.

      • TextPos

        public TextPos(int value)
        Creates a new instance of TextPos
        Parameters:
        value - The initial position (where 1 is the lowest value!).

      • TextPos

        public TextPos(boolean baseZero,
       int value)
        Creates a new instance of TextPos
        Parameters:
        baseZero - If true the value is zero based.
        value - The initial position (lowest value is 0 or 1 depending on value of baseZero).

        public static TextPos fromBaseZeroValue(int value)
        Returns a new TextPos based on a base zero value.
        Parameters:
        value - The base zero value to convert to a TextPos.

      • fromLengthValue

        public static TextPos fromLengthValue(int length)
        Returns a TextPos based on a length value, i.e the last poition on a line.

        This will correctly handle a length of 0.

        Parameters:
        length - The length value to make a TextPos of.
